userProfile.title: User Profile
userProfile.updatedDesc: Your profile information has been updated successfully.
userProfile.memoryDesc: View and manage your chat, analysis, and recommendations history.
userProfile.accountSettingsDesc: Manage your account settings and preferences.
userProfile.securitySettingsDesc: Manage your password and account security.
userProfile.standardAccountDesc: Basic features for agricultural business analysis
userProfile.personalInfoDesc: Update your personal information and how others see you.
userProfile.deleteAllChatHistoryDesc: This will permanently delete all your conversations. This action cannot be undone.
userProfile.deleteAllAnalysisHistoryDesc: This will permanently delete all your analysis results. This action cannot be undone.
userProfile.deleteAllRecommendationsDesc: This will permanently delete all your recommendations. This action cannot be undone.
chat.welcomeDesc: Your AI-powered agricultural business assistant. I can help you with:
chat.demandForecastingDesc: Predict future sales and market trends
chat.aiAssistanceDesc: Get insights and advice for your farm
chat.gettingStarted: How can I help you today?
chat.gettingStartedDesc: Type a question in the chat or try one of these examples:
chat.example.businessFeasibility: Help me analyze if a strawberry farm would be profitable
chat.example.demandForecasting: Forecast corn demand for the next 6 months
chat.example.optimizationAnalysis: Optimize my crop selection to maximize profits
chat.assistantDesc: Arina is an AI assistant that can browse the web and integrate with your business tools.
form.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
form.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
dashboard.title: Dashboard
notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.desc: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.
tools.businessFeasibility.title: Business Feasibility
tools.businessFeasibility.businessNameTo: Enter the name of your business.
tools.businessFeasibility.investmentCost: One-time expenses to start the business.
One-time expenses to start the business
tools.businessFeasibility.unitsSoldToolt: Number of units sold per period.
tools.businessFeasibility.markupTooltip: Percentage added to unit cost for profit.
tools.businessFeasibility.unitCostToolti: Cost of producing one unit including direct materials, labor, and overhead.
tools.businessFeasibility.unitCostFormul: Formula: (Total Operational Costs + Production Cost) ÷ Sales Volume
tools.businessFeasibility.sellingPriceTo: The price at which each unit is sold to customers, calculated by adding the markup percentage to the unit cost.
tools.businessFeasibility.breakEvenUnits: The number of units that need to be sold to cover all costs, where total revenue equals total costs.
Formula: Fixed Costs ÷ (Selling Price - Variable Cost per Unit)
tools.businessFeasibility.breakEvenAmoun: The revenue amount needed to cover all costs, representing the point where no profit or loss is made.
Formula: Break Even Units × Selling Price
tools.businessFeasibility.monthlyNetProf: The profit generated each period after deducting all costs from revenue.
Formula: (Sales Volume × Selling Price) - Total Costs
tools.businessFeasibility.profitMarginTo: The percentage of revenue that represents profit, indicating how much of each rupiah of revenue is kept as profit.
tools.businessFeasibility.paybackPeriodT: The time required to recover the initial investment through profit generation.
tools.businessFeasibility.paybackPeriodF: Formula: Total Investment ÷ Annual Net Profit
tools.businessFeasibility.roiTooltip: Return on Investment - The percentage return earned on the initial investment annually.
tools.demandForecasting.title: Demand Forecasting
tools.demandForecasting.productNameToolt: Enter the name of the product you want to forecast demand for.
tools.demandForecasting.historicalDemand: Provide historical demand data for at least three periods to generate an accurate forecast.
Enter at least 3 periods of historical data
tools.demandForecasting.periodTooltip: Specify the period for this demand data (e.g., month, week).
tools.demandForecasting.methodTooltip: Select the forecasting method to use: Simple Moving Average (SMA) or Exponential Smoothing.
tools.demandForecasting.smaDesc: SMA calculates the average of the last n periods.
tools.demandForecasting.exponentialDesc: Exponential smoothing gives more weight to recent observations.
tools.demandForecasting.chartHelpSolid: • Solid line: Your actual historical demand data
tools.demandForecasting.chartHelpPoint: • Each point represents demand for one period
tools.demandForecasting.chartHelpHover: • Hover over points to see exact values
toast.normalDescription: This is a normal toast notification.
toast.errorDescription: This is an error toast notification.
debugPanel.title: Debugging
chat.title: Welcome to Arina!
chat.welcomeMessage: Your AI-powered agricultural business assistant. Start a conversation to get insights and recommendations.
sidebar.arinaDescription: Arina is your AI-powered assistant for agricultural business analysis and decision support.
notifications.title: Notifications
sidebar.analysisHistoryDescription: View your past analyses and results.
sidebar.smartRecommendationsDescription: Get personalized recommendations based on your data.
sidebar.demandForecastingDescription: Forecast demand for your products and optimize inventory.
sidebar.businessFeasibilityDescription: Evaluate the feasibility of your business ideas and projects.
tools.demandForecasting.demandTooltip: The actual demand for the product in the specified period.
tools.optimization.title: Optimization Analysis
tools.demandForecasting.periodLengthTool: The length of each period in your historical data (e.g., months, weeks).
tools.optimization.name: Name
tools.optimization.nameTooltip: Provide a name for this optimization analysis (e.g., 'Farm Optimization').
tools.optimization.objectiveTooltip: Choose whether to maximize profit, minimize cost, or set multiple goals.
tools.optimization.variableNameTooltip: Enter a descriptive name for the variable.
tools.optimization.profitPerUnitTooltip: Profit earned for each unit of this variable.
tools.optimization.upperBoundTooltip: Maximum value this variable can take.
tools.optimization.constraintNameTooltip: Enter a descriptive name for the constraint.
tools.optimization.coefficientsTooltip: Set the coefficients for each variable in this constraint.
tools.optimization.signTooltip: Select the sign for the constraint.
tools.optimization.rhsTooltip: Set the right hand side value for the constraint.
tools.optimization.goalCoefficientsDesc: Set the coefficients for each variable in this goal.
tools.optimization.targetValueDesc: Set the target value for this goal.
tools.optimization.priorityDesc: Set the priority for this goal (lower = higher priority).
tools.recommendations.title: Smart Recommendations
tools.recommendations.listTooltip: View a list of actionable recommendations tailored to your business needs.
tools.recommendations.additionalInsights: Explore additional insights and trends to enhance your decision-making process.
These insights are generated based on the latest data and trends in the agricultural sector.
tools.analysisHistory.title: Analysis History
tools.analysisHistory.noResultsDesc: Start using the analysis tools to generate insights that will be saved here.
tools.analysisHistory.noResultsFilter: No results match your current filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.
tools.optimization.profitPerUnitDesc: Profit earned for each unit of this variable.
tools.demandForecasting.smoothingFactorT: Set the smoothing factor (alpha) for exponential smoothing. Value between 0 and 1.
tools.demandForecasting.maeTooltip: Mean Absolute Error (MAE) measures the average magnitude of errors in a set of forecasts, without considering their direction.
tools.demandForecasting.mapeTooltip: Mean Absolute Percentage Error (MAPE) measures the average absolute percent error between actual and forecasted values.
tools.analysisHistory.loadError: Error loading analysis history. Please try again later.
sidebar.optimizationAnalysisDescription: Analyze and optimize your agricultural operations to maximize profits or minimize costs.
tools.optimization.enterCoefficients: Enter coefficients for each variable in this constraint.
tools.optimization.defineGoalsTooltip: Set the goals for your optimization, such as maximizing profit or minimizing costs.
tools.optimization.defineVariablesToolti: Define the decision variables that will be optimized, such as production quantities or resource allocations.
tools.optimization.rightHandSideTooltip: Set the right hand side value for the constraint, which represents the limit or requirement that must be satisfied.
tools.optimization.defineConstraintsTool: Set the constraints that your optimization must satisfy, such as resource limits or production requirements.
tools.optimization.setCoefficients: Set coefficients for each variable in this goal.
tools.optimization.priorityTooltip: Set the priority for this goal, where lower values indicate higher priority. This is used in goal programming to determine which goals to satisfy first.
tools.optimization.targetValueTooltip: Set the target value for this goal, which represents the desired outcome you want to achieve.
